title: Destroy the repurchase cofix coin (53.6%)
body:
As of this time (2021-09-29 07:21:20 UTC), we've repurchased 6,833,203 COFIX coin, as the number of circulation is 5,901,826. Repurchases accounted for 53.6 percent. It's time for our first token deflation. What we need to do is destroy it completely. That would stop prices from falling, give the community hope and stabilize the current situation. 

New products can develop only when the situation stabilizes, otherwise the price falls of each product feed off each other and cause a death spiral

截至此时(2012-09-29 07:21:20 UTC)，我们已经回购了6,833,203枚COFIX硬币，流通数量为5,901,826枚，回购占比达53.6%。现在是我们第一次实现真正的通货紧缩的时候了，我们要做的是将其完全销毁。这将阻止价格下跌，给社区希望并稳定当前的局势。

局势稳定住，新产品才能得以发展，否则，各产品价格的下跌相互影响，会导致死亡螺旋
author: 0x36b7C360dE54850063FD862513f647dFd29cdf57
